title: Does anyone like the way that champs are being released recently?
body:
Meaning kit wise and such. I'm curious.

Examples being {{champion:268}} {{champion:421}} {{champion:429}} {{champion:150}}

replies.body: more mobility is all anyone wants anymore, this game is not what it was when it started. its going in a completely different direction. its not for everyone and since i live on the east coast all this skill shots and mobility i feel is hurting me more and more every champ. i know im not that good but playing at 100-130 ping compared to x
We need more CC and less mobility. Most champions before didn't have all this CC AND mobility. There's a reason why Vi and J4 are top bans right now, much like they have been for a while.
They need to make more ground breaking champions that aren't mobile because they are the most interesting ones since then they have to rely on some insane mechanic besides mobility.
I like how they're exploring new concepts and not just giving slight revisions of old abilities. They do need to be very cautious of the continued mobility creep, though.
I don't like their high mobilty since the older champs have very little of it and no cc to stop it since mobility wasn't that much of a think back then.
